name: Volcanion EX
author: Mitsuhiro Arita

abilities.name: Steam Up
abilities.effect: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may discard a {R} Energy card from your hand. If you do, during this turn, your Basic {R} Pokémon’s attacks do 30 more damage to your opponent’s Active Pokémon (before applying Weakness and Resistance).

attacks.name: Volcanic Heat
attacks.effect: This Pokémon can’t attack during your next turn.

rule_box: When a Pokémon-EX has been Knocked Out, your opponent takes 2 Prize cards.
